name.jp: リキュアランス(1次転職のお祝い)

description.en: Congratulations on achieving your 1st Job! This will allow you to redistribute your skill points once.
description.ar: Congratulations on achieving your 1st Job! This will allow you to redistribute your skill points once.
description.br: Parabéns por alcançar sua 1a Classe! Isto permitirá redistribuir seus pontos de habilidade uma vez.
description.cns: 恭喜您成功1转！该物品可以重置您的技能点一次。
description.de: Gratulation zu deinem ersten Jobwechsel! Diese Rolle erlaubt dir, deine Skillpunkte einmalig neu zu verteilen. Nicht verwendbar als Vagrant. Nicht tauschbar.
description.fi: Congratulations on achieving your 1st Job! This will allow you to redistribute your skill points once.
description.fil: Congratulations on achieving your 1st Job! This will allow you to redistribute your skill points once.
description.fr: parchemin obtenu au changement de classe et permettant de redistribuer une seule fois tous les points de compétences, faites-en bon usage ! (ne peut être échangé ou stocké)
description.id: Selamat telah mencapai 1st Job! Ini akan memungkinkanmu untuk mendistribusikan kembali poin skill karaktermu..
description.it: Congratulations on achieving your 1st Job! This will allow you to redistribute your skill points once.
description.jp: スキル初期化アイテム。1次転職に成功した者に与えられる。
description.kr: 1차 전직에 성공한 플레이어에게 지급되는 스킬초기화 아이템
description.nl: Congratulations on achieving your 1st Job! This will allow you to redistribute your skill points once.
description.pl: Congratulations on achieving your 1st Job! This will allow you to redistribute your skill points once.
description.ru: Поздравляем! Вы выбрали свое первое амплуа. С этим вы можете перераспределить очки умений (но только один раз).
description.sp: ¡Felicidades por alcanzar tu 1ra Clase! Esto te permitirá redistribuir tus puntos de habilidad una vez.
description.sw: Congratulations on achieving your 1st Job! This will allow you to redistribute your skill points once.
description.th: ยินดีด้วยที่สำเร็จงานที่ 1 ของคุณ! สิ่งนี้จะช่วยให้คุณสามารถแจกจ่ายskill pointsของคุณได้ครั้งเดียว
description.tw: 給成功第1轉職的玩家的技能重置卷
description.vi: Chúc mừng bạn đã đạt được Công việc đầu tiên của mình! Điều này sẽ cho phép bạn phân phối lại điểm kỹ năng của mình một lần.
